description:
Kyosuke looks after his little cousin Kazuya. Unfortunately for him, Kazuya is psychic, and has decided to `help` Kyosuke with Madoka and Hikaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Introducing Kazuya! Be Very Careful around the "Panic Kid"
Kazuya Toujou! Panic Kid ni Goyoujin
一弥登場!パニックキッドにご用心
